org.openadaptor.core.connector
Class DBEventDrivenPollingReadConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.core.connector.AbstractPollingReadConnector
          org.openadaptor.core.connector.DBEventDrivenPollingReadConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IPollingReadConnector, IReadConnector
public class DBEventDrivenPollingReadConnector
extends AbstractPollingReadConnector

A polling read connector that uses a stored procedure to poll for database events. These events must be in a specific format and this component will convert that into a call to underlying connector to query the data that relates to the event. By default it calls a predefined stored procedure called OA3_GetNextQueuedEvent. Refer to openadaptor resources for the schema it is associated with.

Author:
Kuldip Ottal, Kris Lachor

next

public java.lang.Object[] next(long timeoutMs)

polls for the data that relates to the next event in the database the format of the data is controlled by the resultSetConverter returns null if there are no outstanding events to process.
